MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY12 postcode area of Dunfermline. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm following reports of a safety concern on our underground cable network due to third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:09pm on the 18th of December 2020.
